A story about a person who accidentally gets trapped in time and relives the same day over and over again.
A poem about the beauty of a single moment in time that seems to stretch on forever.
A science fiction novel where a time machine malfunctions and the protagonist is stuck in the past or future.
A memoir about a person who has a traumatic experience that they can't forget, even after years have passed.
A philosophical essay about the concept of time and the importance of living in the present moment.
